message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $9,500. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit steep for me. Would you consider $7,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $7,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $9,000. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be well worth the investment.
I understand the value, Alice, but I have a strict budget. Could we meet in the middle at $8,000?
